entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 8.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 8:28 AM EDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning.
